mn23:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn23:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā kumārakassapo andhavane viharati.
mn23:1.4: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ andhavanaṁ obhāsetvā yenāyasmā kumārakassapo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho sā devatā āyasmantaṁ kumārakassapaṁ etadavoca:
mn23:2.1: “Bhikkhu bhikkhu, ayaṁ vammiko rattiṁ dhūmāyati, divā pajjalati.
mn23:2.4: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa laṅgiṁ
mn23:2.9: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa uddhumāyikaṁ.
mn23:2.14: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa dvidhāpathaṁ.
mn23:2.19: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa caṅgavāraṁ.
mn23:2.24: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa kummaṁ.
mn23:2.29: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa asisūnaṁ.
mn23:2.34: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa maṁsapesiṁ.
mn23:2.39: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa nāgaṁ.
mn23:2.42: ‘tiṭṭhatu nāgo, mā nāgaṁ ghaṭṭesi; namo karohi nāgassā’ti.
mn23:2.43: Ime kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, pañhe bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā puccheyyāsi, yathā ca te bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṁ dhāreyyāsi.
mn23:2.44: Nāhaṁ taṁ, bhikkhu, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yo imesaṁ pañhānaṁ veyyākaraṇena cittaṁ ārādheyya aññatra tathāgatena vā, tathāgatasāvakena vā, ito vā pana sutvā”ti—
mn23:3.1: Atha kho āyasmā kumārakassapo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā kumārakassapo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn23:3.2: “imaṁ, bhante, rattiṁ aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ andhavanaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho, bhante, sā devatā maṁ etadavoca:
mn23:3.3: ‘bhikkhu bhikkhu, ayaṁ vammiko rattiṁ dhūmāyati, divā pajjalati.
mn23:3.10: Ko nu kho, bhante, vammiko, kā rattiṁ dhūmāyanā, kā divā pajjalanā, ko brāhmaṇo, ko sumedho, kiṁ satthaṁ, kiṁ abhikkhaṇaṁ, kā laṅgī, kā uddhumāyikā, ko dvidhāpatho, kiṁ caṅgavāraṁ, ko kummo, kā asisūnā, kā maṁsapesi, ko nāgo”ti?
mn23:4.1: “‘Vammiko’ti kho, bhikkhu, imassetaṁ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa adhivacanaṁ, mātāpettikasambhavassa odanakummāsūpacayassa aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṁsanadhammassa.
mn23:4.2: Yaṁ kho, bhikkhu, divā kammante ārabbha rattiṁ anuvitakketi anuvicāreti—
mn23:4.4: Yaṁ kho, bhikkhu, rattiṁ anuvitakketvā anuvicāretvā divā kammante payojeti kāyena vācāya ‘manasā’—
mn23:4.6: ‘Brāhmaṇo’ti kho, bhikkhu, tathāgatassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
mn23:4.12: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.15: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.18: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.19: ‘Caṅgavāran’ti kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṁ nīvaraṇānaṁ adhivacanaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
mn23:4.22: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.23: ‘Kummo’ti kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ adhivacanaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
mn23:4.26: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.28: cakkhuviññeyyānaṁ rūpānaṁ iṭṭhānaṁ kantānaṁ manāpānaṁ piyarūpānaṁ kāmūpasaṁhitānaṁ rajanīyānaṁ,
mn23:4.32: kāyaviññeyyānaṁ phoṭṭhabbānaṁ iṭṭhānaṁ kantānaṁ manāpānaṁ piyarūpānaṁ kāmūpasaṁhitānaṁ rajanīyānaṁ.
mn23:4.34: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.37: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.39: Tiṭṭhatu nāgo, mā nāgaṁ ghaṭṭesi; namo karohi nāgassāti ayametassa attho”ti.
mn23:4.41: Attamano āyasmā kumārakassapo bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
